member.name: M:Job_candidate_hub_API.Controllers.CandidateController.AddOrUpdateCandidate(Models.CandidateModel)
member.summary: This endpoint accespts, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, CallTimeInterval, LinkedinUrl, GithubUrl and Comment. If the Candidate already exist the details are updated and returns a message indicating the same, this is also true for when a new candidates profile is added.
member.respone: Returns success if the data is added or updated
